players.name: Bob
memory: You: "I think Alice was killed by the mafioso. We should investigate Diana and Charlie."
Diana: "Let's investigate Charlie, they were the mafioso last night."
Charlie: "I'm innocent, I didn't kill Alice. Investigate Diana instead."
